definition: axis/axle/spool (for thread)/roller (for scrolls)/classifier for calligraphy rolls etc
see 壓軸戲|压轴戏[ya1 zhou4 xi4]/Taiwan pr. [zhou2]

sentences.english: The Axis alliance with Japan in the East.
sentences.chinese: 希特勒在东部与日本结成轴心国联盟。

sentences.english: Japan entered World War I and declared war on the Central Powers.
sentences.chinese: 日本作为轴心国参加了第一次世界大战。

sentences.english: Otobong Etuk Why do you think Nigeria would join the axis.
sentences.chinese: 为什么你认为尼日利亚会加入轴心国？

sentences.english: The Red Army destroyed 507 Axis divisions.
sentences.chinese: 苏联红军摧毁了轴心国的507个师。

sentences.english: To be represented at the founding conference in San Francisco, states had to have declared war on the axis powers beforehand.
sentences.chinese: 出席旧金山成立大会的国家必须曾向轴心国宣战。

sentences.english: Tank wrecks found on maps are no longer salvageable.
sentences.chinese: 地图上自带的坦克残骸将不能被轴心国工兵回收。

sentences.english: Axis Ostwind Flakpanzer area of effect radius increased.
sentences.chinese: 轴心国东风防空坦克炮弹杀伤范围增加。

definition: Allies/entente (i.e. Western powers allied to China in WW1)

pinyin: Di4 er4 Ci4 Shi4 jie4 Da4 zhan4

definition: Pacific War between Japan and the US, 1941-1945
Benito Mussolini (1883-1945), Italian fascist dictator, "Il Duce", president 1922-1943

Battle of Stalingrad (1942-1943), decisive battle of Second World War and one of the bloodiest battles in history, when the Germans failed to take Stalingrad, were then trapped and destroyed by Soviet forces
pinyin: Si1 da4 lin2 ge2 le4 Zhan4 yi4
